data.reasoning: There is insufficient data (no menu or reviews mentioning allergens) to make a definitive safety assessment. The lack of any data results in a neutral, but cautious, initial score. Without a menu or specific mention of gluten-free protocols, cross-contact risk in a traditional Chinese restaurant (Great Wall) is inherently high due to soy sauce, flour, and shared fryers.
risk_factors: No menu data available to screen for gluten-containing ingredients (e.g., soy sauce, wheat noodles, batter).
No review data confirming staff knowledge or dedicated gluten-free procedures.
High inherent risk of cross-contact in standard Chinese restaurant kitchens (shared woks, utensils, soy sauce contact).
safe_alternatives: Cannot determine any safe alternatives without a menu.
